trans-unit.source: Binds a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> (or another <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementation).
A MouseBinding associates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementation.

<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is the primary implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commanding system.

In general, when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is executed, the command is invoked, although the command behavior is further influenced by command-specific factors such as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>은 실행 명령이 호출 될, 명령 동작은 영향을 받기 명령 별 요소와 같은 있지만 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A>값.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see the [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 명령에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조는 [명령 실행 개요](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: When defining a MouseBinding in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: MouseBinding 정의할 때 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], 두 가지 방법으로 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> 지정 하려면

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a MouseBinding in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the MouseBinding element, which enables a syntax to specify mouse actions and modifiers as a single string; for example, "CTRL+LeftClick".
trans-unit.target: MouseBinding를 설정 하는 첫 번째 방법은 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 정의 하는 것은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>MouseBinding 요소의 단일 문자열로 마우스 동작 및 한정자를 지정 하는 구문을 사용 하면 특성; 예를 들어 "CTRL + LeftClick".</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> attribute of the MouseBinding element.
trans-unit.target: 두 번째 방법은 정의 하는 것은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>MouseBinding 요소의 특성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 두 가지 방법을 모두는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>동일 하 고 같은 내부 개체를 수정 하지만 할 충돌이 모두 사용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are both set, the gesture is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 경우에 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A>특성이 모두 설정, 제스처 올바르지 않습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], even if you do not specify modifiers; this avoids ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 것이 좋습니다만 사용 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>에서 특성 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]경우에 한정자를 지정 하지 않습니다;이 모호성을 방지 하는 가장 효율적인된 구문을 제공 되 고, 제공 serialization에 대 한 가장 간단한 표현입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: A MouseBinding can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> class.
trans-unit.target: MouseBinding 정의할 수 있습니다 또는 클래스 수준에서 특정 개체에 대 한 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> 에</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> 등록 하 여

trans-unit.source: The most typical way to define a MouseBinding is within the control template, setting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] by declaring one or more MouseBinding or <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elements.
trans-unit.target: MouseBinding를 정의 하는 가장 일반적인 방법은 설정 하는 컨트롤 템플릿을 내인지는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>속성 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 하나 이상의 MouseBinding 선언 하 여 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>요소.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref> class, using the specified command and mouse gesture.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref> 클래스, 지정 된 명령 및 마우스 제스처를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The command associated with the gesture.
The gesture associated with the command.
Copies the base (non-animated) values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 개체의 속성의 기본 (애니메이션이 적용 되지 않은) 값을 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
Copies the current values of the properties of the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 개체의 속성의 현재 값을 복사합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
Creates an instance of an <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref>.
The new object.
Gets or sets the gesture associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 연결 된이 제스처를 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> with or without a set of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to have a modifier key associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 와 달리 역할에 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>이와 관련 된 한정자 키가 필요 하지 않습니다</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The gesture.
Gesture is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 로 설정 된 제스처 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates the instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> by using base (non-animated) property values.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 만듭니다. 지정 된의 고정된 복제본 <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> 기본 (애니메이션이 적용 되지 않은) 속성 값을 사용 하 여 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
Creates the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 인스턴스가 지정 된의 고정된 복제본으로 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
trans-unit.target: 개체에 애니메이션 효과 준된 종속성 속성이 애니메이션된의 현재 값은 복사 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding"></xref>.
Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to be associated with a modifier key.
So a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> by itself, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>, can be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
The mouse action.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction*> dependency property.
To be added.
